node.title: Responding To God's Call To Serve
node.description: The dynamics of pioneering and effectively serving/leading a faith based ministry are challenging and complex.  This is especially true in our present day world of tremendous affluence, highly advanced technology and multi-cultural/multi-generational communities. Yet amidst all this--Christ's methods alone continue to provide the foundation of true success for effective ministry. Exploring the principles and talents of God's servants provide insight and examples for ministry leaders today.
